programme.title: The Jane Mysteries: Murder at Moseby
programme.desc: Jane goes undercover at her alma mater to help her college boyfriend solve a crime he may have witnessed years ago during the annual Edgar Allan Poe Festival.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche has trouble dealing with her father's plan to marry a much younger woman.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy, Rose and Blanche are mistakenly arrested for prostitution while vacationing in Miami Beach.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy begs Blanche to go out with her ex-husband, Stan, but becomes jealous when the couple hits it off.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A neighbor dies shortly after having a heated argument with Rose.

programme.desc: Rose befriends Dorothy's former college buddy (Lois Nettleton), not knowing that the woman is a lesbian.

programme.desc: Van insists on coaching Reba after she agrees to compete against Brock in a 5K race to raise money for Jake's school.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Van announces he is quitting school to try out for arena football, but Reba's disapproval causes him to blow his chance.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Over Brock and Barbra Jean's objections, Reba gives Kyra permission to go on her first date, then discovers the boy is 17 years old.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne suspects Van of cheating on her with a sexy publicist and kicks him out of the house.

programme.desc: Frasier and Roz end up roommates at a broadcasting convention; Martin accepts a lawyer's offer to stake out a philandering husband.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier's agent Bebe (Harriet Sansom Harris) becomes his unlikely co-host during a temporary stint on a TV talk show.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier is caught in a compromising position with a stripper (Rachel York) while trying to win back his ex (Gigi Rice).

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier is initially flattered to be featured as a caricature at a restaurant -- until he sees the finished product.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Carla holds up well after Eddie is killed in a freak accident -- until his other widow (Anne De Salvo) shows up.

programme.title: Cheers

programme.desc: Cheyenne is upset when Van decides to shave his head for the team; Barbra Jean convinces Reba to go into business with her.

programme.desc: While Dorothy is laid off from teaching, she finds work at the same museum where Blanche goes to work.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy and Blanche contrive an answer to Rose's personal ad.

programme.title: A Gift of Miracles
programme.desc: Darcy finds a list of belongings her estranged mother had intended to give to close friends and family, and sets out to fulfill those wishes. While making deliveries, she encounters small and miraculous events that help guide her in life.

programme.title: Stop the Wedding
programme.desc: A young, single attorney discovers that her aunt's new fiance is a TV star known more his failed marriages than his acting.

programme.title: A Ring by Spring
programme.desc: A woman (Rachel Boston) ponders her future when a fortuneteller (Stefanie Powers) predicts a lifetime of loneliness if she does not wed soon.

programme.title: The Last Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Single Becca has been a bridesmaid too many times, but then she meets a handsome videographer at her cousin's wedding.

programme.title: A Christmas Carousel
programme.desc: Lila is hired by the royal family of Ancadia to repair a carousel and must work with the prince to complete it by Christmas.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.desc: Sophia takes action when a depressed, gun-toting Santa Claus threatens to ruin Christmas for her and her housemates.

programme.desc: Actor Woody has to explain a stage smooch to his girlfriend; the guys engage in a "best beard" contest.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Robin Colcord's lavish -- and well-protected -- apartment is the setting for Sam and Rebecca's latest misadventure.

programme.desc: Barbara Jean arranges a blind date for reluctant Reba; Van uses his bonus to buy a new sports car without consulting Cheyenne.

programme.desc: Trying to be more wild, Reba takes Van's new sports car for a joy ride and accidntally ends up scratching it.

programme.desc: Barbra Jean comes to Reba for advice when she suspects that Brock is cheating on her; Kyra's boyfriend breaks her heart.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Tensions between Reba and Barbra Jean lead to a bar brawl when they have a girls' night out to celebrate Cheyenne's birthday.

programme.title: Love at the Shore
programme.desc: A mother of two who is an author finds her summer plans disrupted by the annoyingly unconventional but undeniably attractive surfer living next door to her rental.

programme.title: Sweet Carolina
programme.desc: A marketing executive reconnects with her high school boyfriend after becoming the unexpected guardian of her niece and nephew.

programme.title: The Beach House
programme.desc: Caretta thought she'd left her Southern roots and troubled family far behind until her mother lures her home. As she repairs the family beach house and renews old acquaintances, the rhythms of the island open her heart in wonderful ways.

programme.title: Love to the Rescue
programme.desc: Two single parents find themselves competing for the same dog at a school pet adoption function.

programme.title: The More Love Grows
programme.desc: Helen gets blindsided when her husband asks for a separation. With help from a friendly vet and a rambunctious stray dog, she rediscovers her strength and begins to rebuild her life.

programme.title: A New Year's Resolution
programme.desc: A morning show producer reluctantly becomes the subject of her own program's on-air experiment about her New Year's resolution to agree to every social invitation for a month.

programme.title: Love in the Clouds
programme.desc: Reporter Brooklyn travels to the Balloon Fiesta to meet hot air balloon pilot Jared, who offers romantic balloon rides but is closed off to love himself.
